name: Abaddon All Hope
description:
The city of Axia, once a blooming city of technical advancement gets plunged into chaos after a rogue AI named Abaddon takes over all technology in the city. It is up to Adam, our protagonist, to control his units and take back the city from the grasp of Abaddon.

Controls:

WASD - Camera Movement

Left click - Unit selection / UI Interaction
